## hpr0291 :: moonlight discussion

 monsterb, threethirty, klaatu,
jlindsay, and dann talk about moonlight, mono, silverlight, flash,
licensing, and patents. Plus the debut of a votekick ending.moonlight is an open source implementation of Microsoft Silverlight for Unix systems.mono is a cross platform, open source .NET development framework.mono licensing GPL, LGL, MIT X11Fox Movie Trailers to test moonlight and silverlight.
